content: Kwik-Con+ Torx countersunk flat head screw anchor Versatile, high-performance screw anchor for concrete and masonry (carbon steel, countersunk flat head with Torx®) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier and quicker installation with just one tool Torx® flat head (countersunk) for more secure driving and no bit slippage Durable design minimizes risk of head snaps Stainless steel fasteners available in select sizes (or through our special department) Matched-tolerance carbide-tipped drill bits required when installing these screw anchors Applications Fastening on concrete, block, brick or masonry Fitting window and door frames Installing electrical wall fixtures Installing handrails ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Countersunk Torx Approvals / Test reports: Miami Dade County Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Countersunk Torx | Approvals / Test reports | Miami Dade County | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (solid) | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | No | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 8 µm) ### ITEMS- 2260092 -
